title: Checkatrade Trophy quarter-final draw: Chelsea U21s host Oxford
description: Chelsea U21s will host League One side Oxford on the quarter-finals of the Checkatrade Trophy.
content:
Oxford, who lost in the final at Wembley last year, will head to the Blues academy side after the draw was conducted live on EFL Matters on Sky Sports Football on Thursday.
Elsewhere, League Two Lincoln host League One Peterborough, and League Two Yeovil welcome League One Fleetwood to Huish Park.
And League One side Shrewsbury will host Oldham or Leicester U21s, with that match being played next week after the initial fixture was postponed.
All quarter-final fixtures will be played in the week commencing January 22.
Lincoln City v Peterborough United
Shrewsbury v Oldham or Leicester U21
Chelsea U21 v Oxford
Yeovil v Fleetwood
